ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlhilslem.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |

| 3 |  | hlhilslem.u | |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | hlhilslem.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |

| 8 |  | #P_3nn | |- 3 e. NN |
| 9 |  | #P_3lt4 | |- 3 < 4 |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 6 | #P_hlhilslem | |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .r ` R ) ) |
